analysis.description:
BulleonCrowdsale.refundMoney (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#755-758) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(refundAmount) (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#757-758)

BulleonCrowdsale.withdrawFunds (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#794-798) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- withdrawWallet.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#796-797)

Reentrancy in BulleonCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#663-702):
	External calls:
	- currentTokensAmount = availableTokens() (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#667-669)
	- require(bool)(isActive() && validPurchase) (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#673)
	- tokensAndRefund = calcMultiStage() (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#684-686)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentStage (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#695-697)
	- soldOnStage (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#695-697)

Reentrancy in BulleonCrowdsale.calcMultiStage (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#709-742):
	External calls:
	- undistributedTokens = availableTokens() (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#712-714)
	- stageBoughtTokens > availableOnStage() (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#721-727)
	- stageBoughtTokens = availableOnStage() (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#722-726)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentStage (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#740)
	- soldOnStage (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#735-736)
	- soldOnStage (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#740)

BulleonCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#663-702) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-rewardToken.transfer(beneficiary,boughtTokens) (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#697-698)

Reentrancy in BulleonCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#663-702):
	External calls:
	- currentTokensAmount = availableTokens() (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#667-669)
	- require(bool)(isActive() && validPurchase) (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#673)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investmentsOf (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#675-678)

Reentrancy in BulleonCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#663-702):
	External calls:
	- currentTokensAmount = availableTokens() (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#667-669)
	- require(bool)(isActive() && validPurchase) (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#673)
	- tokensAndRefund = calcMultiStage() (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#684-686)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in BulleonToken.unpause (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#536-541):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(! crowdsale.isActive() || msg.sender == owner) (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#538-539)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- paused (/unique_chucks/30/0x645a90d222d46139d72477f1d41a3c970a2880f4.sol#540-541)
